column4: is this a good place to ask why sound usually stops coming from my laptop headphone jack after a combination of muting and unplugging the headphones in 12.04?

is this a good place to ask why sound usually stops coming from my laptop headphone jack after a combination of muting and unplugging the headphones in 12.04? (sorry, like 10000 people joined/dc'd right after i asked)
try:  killall pulseaudio; rm -r ~/.pulse*    wait 10 seconds then retry sound
